underlying_goal: Summarize and translate a paywalled Kent Beck Substack article into an Obsidian note with images
friction_detail: Chrome process conflicts prevented Playwright from launching, requiring multiple rounds of closing Chrome and dealing with paywall/login before content could be extracted.
brief_summary: User requested an Obsidian summary/translation of a paywalled Substack article; after overcoming Chrome conflicts and paywall login issues, Claude successfully extracted the content, downloaded images, and created the Obsidian note.
